If you're interested in fairytales with a twist, Maleficent (2014) is another great choice featuring Angelina Jolie as the titular character. Enjoy your movie time!

I'd highly recommend giving "The Number 23" a try, especially if you enjoy a suspenseful story about obsession and a twist of mystery. Written by Scott Alexander and Larry Gross (not Paul Wernick, but still worth mentioning), it stars Jim Carrey and Virginia Madsen in a thought-provoking thriller.

Another film I think you might appreciate is "The Rum Diary" starring Johnny Depp. This one takes place in the 1960s Puerto Rico and follows an American journalist struggling to find his place between island culture and expatriates, providing a great steampunkish vibe with its era-appropriate setting.
